content.body: I'll have to audit it for call sites that should change from `?` to `!`, like CreateTemporalDate without passing newTarget (to repeat the example I discussed with bakkot)
content.formatted_body: I'll have to audit it for call sites that should change from ? to !, like CreateTemporalDate without passing newTarget (to repeat the example I discussed with bakkot)

content.body: likely after that it'll still be a lot of UC
the main decision that's responsible for that is to accept strings or property bags in addition to Temporal objects at API entry points

that's responsible for Get in the case of a non-Temporal object being passed, and ToString in the case of a primitive being passed, which makes coercion operations like ToTemporalDate potentially call UC
nonetheless, I believe it was a good decision
fair, apologies if it came off like a stronger value judgment than it was intended to be
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: fair, apologies if it came off like a stronger value judgment than it was intended to be

content.body: i am not the domain expert in the room

content.body: no worries, I didn't take it that way
but it did seem like something that warranted an explanation
